summary: With a versatile background in technology, marketing, and business, I began honing my skills at an exceptionally young age, becoming an Apple Certified Technician at just 12 years old. My experience has enabled me to support organizations and clients in embracing modern solutions. Currently, as a Workplace Coordinator at FLYR Labs' Amsterdam office, my passion lies in fostering a positive, inclusive, and supportive work environment for our staff. I oversee daily operations, manage budgets, and coordinate essential deliveries, always ready to lend a helping hand to anyone in need. Focusing on improving processes and organizing team-building events, I contribute to building a strong, cohesive team that thrives in a welcoming atmosphere. As a dedicated and compassionate professional, I am committed to ensuring that everyone feels valued, supported, and empowered for collective success.

profile_positions.description: As a remote Marketing and Business Specialist at Sotheby's International Realty Canada, I employed my diverse skillset to drive brand growth and enhance our online presence. My expertise in social media management enabled me to create engaging content that resonated with our audience and expanded our reach. Leveraging my knowledge in expansion strategies, I contributed to the development of innovative solutions that further solidified our market position. As a proficient user of graphic design tools like Lightroom and Photoshop, I crafted visually compelling materials that showcased our properties and elevated the brand's aesthetic. With a passion for excellence, I continually strived to deliver exceptional results for Sotheby's International Realty Canada.
profile_positions.title: Marketeer & Business Strategist

profile_positions.description: As the Workplace Coordinator for The Amsterdam office, I am passionate about creating a positive and supportive work environment for our staff. My role involves overseeing the daily operations, but more importantly, I am always here to lend a helping hand to anyone who needs it. Whether it's addressing concerns, or just offering a listening ear, I am committed to making sure that everyone feels valued and supported. I also take care of the practicalities such as improving processes, managing budgets and costs, and coordinating deliveries of essential supplies, food, and drinks. But what I really love most is bringing the team together through fun and meaningful events and activities. I believe that a warm and inclusive workplace is key to success, and I am proud to be a part of making that a reality.
profile_positions.title: Workplace Coordinator

profile_positions.description: As an Onboarding Specialist for True North Labour Ltd's digital transition, my role involved guiding employees from a paper-based system to a modern digital platform. I reached out to hundreds of staff members, offering technical support and clear instructions during the onboarding process. My focus was on maintaining a friendly and helpful atmosphere, helping everyone to adapt smoothly to the new system and improve their day-to-day work with updated technology tools.
profile_positions.title: Onboarding Specialist

company.name: Sunshine Coast Apple Repairs and Lessons

profile_positions.company: Sunshine Coast Apple Repairs and Lessons
profile_positions.description: At Sunshine Coast Apple Repairs and Lessons, as the owner, teacher, and technician. My job was all about helping people with their devices, whether it was fixing hardware or software issues or teaching them how to use their gadgets. I provided friendly one-on-one computer lessons, making sure everyone felt comfortable and confident with their devices. My goal was always to create a warm, welcoming atmosphere where customers felt supported and understood.
profile_positions.title: Owner, Technician & Teacher

profile_positions.description: Becoming an Apple Certified Mac Technician at the young age of 12, I embarked on a journey to offer top-notch technical support and personalized guidance to customers. In my role at Rapid Edge, an Apple Authorized Service Provider, I took pride in diagnosing and repairing hardware and software issues on various Apple products, ensuring swift and reliable solutions. My expertise allowed me to help customers find the perfect Apple device tailored to their individual needs, providing friendly advice backed by deep knowledge. Additionally, I conducted one-on-one computer literacy lessons, empowering users to confidently navigate and make the most of their Apple devices.
profile_positions.title: Technician, Teacher & Sales

company.name: Liberal Party of Canada • Parti Libéral du Canada

volunteer_experiences.description: As a valued member of Parliament Patrick Weiler's Constituency Youth Council, I collaborated with fellow council members to address critical social issues affecting our community. One of our notable initiatives involved drafting a Ministerial Letter directed to the Minister of Employment, Workforce Development, and Disability Inclusion, Carla Qualtrough. This letter highlighted the challenges surrounding the cost and affordability of post-secondary education, emphasizing the importance of accessible and inclusive learning opportunities for all. Our collective efforts aimed to foster positive change and pave the way for a more equitable future.
